text:
e="preserve">Barry Austin (17 September 1968 – 1 January 2021) was a British man from Chelmsley Wood, West Midlands, England. He was the fattest man in the United Kingdom. He weighed around 700 lbs or 320 kg. In December 2009 Austin played 'Big Brian' in ITV1's comedy-drama "The Fattest Man in Britain" as Fat Brian.
Austin died on 1 January 2021 at the age of 52.
